# Step #1: Organize

::::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
**:x: Typical Project**

```         
├── analysis.R
├── analysis_v2.R  
├── FINAL_analysis.R
├── analysis_FINAL_v3.R
├── data_raw.csv
├── functions_maybe.R
├── temp_script.R
└── random_test.R
```
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**:white_check_mark: Package Structure**

```         
📦 mypackage/
├── R/           # Code
├── data/        # Data  
├── man/         # Help files
└── vignettes/   # Analysis
```
:::
:::::

::: notes
:::

## Impact: Organization → Efficiency

# Step #2: Document

::::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
**:x: Separate Documents**

```         
├── analysis.R
├── methodology.docx
├── code_guide.pdf
├── final_report.pdf
├── final_report_FINAL.pdf
└── README.txt
```
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**:white_check_mark: Integrated Package**

```         
📦 mypackage/
├── R/           # Code
├── man/         # Help files
└── vignettes/   # Docs + Reports
    └── analysis.Rmd → 📊 Report.pdf
                     → 🌐 Website
```
:::
:::::

::: notes
1 minute - Show how documentation lives with code
:::

## Vignettes = Dual Purpose

```{mermaid}
graph TD
    A[📖 analysis.Rmd] --> B[📋 Documentation<br/>for developers]
    A --> C[📊 Deliverable<br/>for clients]
    B --> D[pkgdown website]
    C --> E[PDF report]
```

::: notes
45 seconds - Key insight about vignettes serving multiple purposes
:::
